attributes.action: STOP CHILDREN BEING TAKEN FROM PARENTS WITHOUT EVIDENCE
attributes.additional_details:
WE ARE NOT ALLOWED TO DEFEND OURSELVES AGAINST THESE ACCUSATIONS OR FALSE REPORTS WE ARE NOT CALLED TO FAMILY COURT WHY WE HAVE RIGHTS OUR CHILDREN HAVE RIGHTS ACCUSATIONS ARE MADE AGAINST US THAT ARE NOTHING BUT HEAR SAY ITS PUT IN A REPORT AS BEING A STATEMENT OF TRUTH WHEN IT HAS NOT EVEN BEEN INVESTIGATED OR IF IT HAS YOU HAVE NOT BEEN INVESTIGATED BY CHILD PROTECTION OR CHILDREN'S SERVICES YOU ARE NOT CALLED TO FAMILY COURT REGARDING THESE ACCUSATIONS TO DEFEND YOUR SELF 
REPORTS ARE FALSE
attributes.background: ITS TIME WE ALL STOOD TOGETHER TO PUT A STOP TO OUR CHILDREN OUR CHILDREN'S CHILDREN BEING REMOVED FROM LOVING FAMILY HOMES AND FOSTERED OUT OR ADOPTED WITHOUT EVIDENCE OF ABUSE  EMOTIONAL HARM ETC ETC

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition in its current form as it does not call for a clear action from the UK Government and Parliament.

If you want to make a complaint about the actions of your local authority, the Local Government Ombudsman may be able to give you advice:

http://www.lgo.org.uk/
